title: The Shire Countryside (3R113)
text:
Set:	Realms of the Elf-lords
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Shire
Twilight:	1
Card Type:	Condition
Game Text:	To play, spot 2 [Shire] companions. Plays to your support area. Each time you remove a burden (except by a Hobbit's game text), you may heal a companion.
Lore:	”'Life in the wide world goes on… scarcely even aware of the existence of hobbits….'”
Rarity:	R
Notes:	Lists: EXL
